==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/2/27/episode-653-february-25-2022 Episode #653: February 25, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex's claim of having predicted the invasion of Ukraine back in fall/winter 2021 is a lie
*Alex believes that the invasion is the West's fault, for providing military aid to Ukraine
*Alex misrepresents comments about NATO possibly invoking Article 5 if Russia does a cyber attack. This is something that has been discussed [https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-49488614 going back to at least 2019], including in [https://www.prospectmagazine.co.uk/world/nato-will-defend-itself-summit-jens-stoltenberg-cyber-security an op-ed written by the Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg]
*[https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2007/02/12/AR2007021200555.html Putin's argument] that the West promised Russia to not expand NATO is [https://csis-website-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/legacy_files/files/publication/twq09aprilkramer.pdf not totally accurate], and [https://www.rbth.com/international/2014/10/16/mikhail_gorbachev_i_am_against_all_walls_40673.html Gorbachev has even said] that this was not part of the negotiations that he was literally a part of
*Alex lies about [https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fviro.2022.834808/full a new paper about Covid]. He's only read [https://weather.com/en-IN/india/coronavirus/news/2022-02-26-new-study-finds-covid-19-dna-linked-to-moderna-patent-filed-in the Daily Mail article] about it, and is exaggerating things from there
*Alex makes up stories about some Chinese media [https://chinadigitaltimes.net/2022/02/minitrue-keep-weibo-posts-on-ukraine-favorable-to-russia-control-comments/ propaganda documents] that got leaked. Also, the [https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2022/feb/23/china-restricts-media-criticism-russia/ Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson has an identical position] about Putin's invasion as Alex does
